item.title: Building a Hugo Site and Theme With Bootstrap
item.description: How is Bootstrap used with Hugo? Bootstrap is in use with hugo-scratch-1 but there aren’t many explicit uses of the classes. So it is time to explore this in more detail by taking notes whilst reading this first search result: Building a Hugo Site and Theme With Bootstrap Result In the photos, this didn’t look right: Now if you go to http://localhost:1313 you should see the normal list of pages that is generated with the default list template.
